#solution

select      t1.ID
           ,t1.Name
           ,t2.Company_group    as RootName
           ,t1_b.ID             as RootId
from                    tbl_1   t1
            join        tbl_2   t2
            on          t2.ID   =
                        t1.ID
            join        tbl_1   t1_b
            on          t1_b.Name   =
                        t2.Company_group
where       t1.ID <> t1_b.ID;

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/40155258/build-tree-from-database

LEFT OUTER JOIN
